Field.Value: In the year 1718 the land of Khazystan found itself at the end of an era of peace and prosperity. As winter closed in around them the people themselves grew cold. The Tzar had fallen ill, and lay on his deathbed. The governor of one of his large cities had taken command, and was imposing new rules to keep the peace. But not everyone was fond of these orders…
